alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Clay, southern Hubbard, northwestern Wadena, northern Otter Tail, Wilkin, Becker, southeastern Clearwater, southeastern Cass and northeastern Richland Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 731 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Emmaville to near Shoreham to near Kindred. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Wahpeton, Park Rapids, Breckenridge, Perham, Barnesville and Pelican Rapids. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 22 and 62. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota...and southeastern North Dakota.
